## About I am a student from India who is interested in Machine Learning, Big Data and other AI related stuff. I create awesome projects, implement research papers and avidly learn things. I prefer ~Azzazzell~ but calling me Aashish is fine too.My passion is to develop things that would make this world a better place to live in ( cliche?! ). In my free time I watch movies, listen music and follow ( like religion! ) football (yeah, the thing you call soccer!).
